How Payments Work

Payment is loaded safely to your account on Tuteria in order to book your lessons and pay the tutor at the end, after you confirm that all lessons have been fully delivered.

This ensures we can secure your payments, monitor lesson delivery, ensure quality service and respond promptly to any emergencies.

We'll send a payment receipt via email and also contact you so we can schedule the lessons and create a detailed lesson plan. Your tutor will call you shortly afterwards to discuss the lessons and prepare ahead of the commencement date.

REFUND POLICY

All lessons are 100% guaranteed. If you are not fully satisfied, we'll promptly replace the tutor or refund your balance. Payments are credited to your wallet and tutors are not paid till all lessons are done.
